CheckInstance.title: Checking whether the instance ID exists

CheckInstanceName.title: Checking whether the name of the instance to be created meets the specifications

CreateCustomAccount.document: This example shows you how to create a custom account.
CreateCustomAccount.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tcr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateCustomAccount
<Common request parameters>

{
    "RegistryId": "tcr-12345",
    "Name": "robot",
    "Description": "desc",
    "ExpiresAt": 1676897989,
    "Disable": false,
    "Permissions": [
        {
            "Resource": "library",
            "Actions": [
                "tcr:PushRepository",
                "tcr:PullRepository"
            ]
        }
    ]
}
CreateCustomAccount.title: Creating a custom account

CreateImmutableTagRules.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tcr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateImmutableTagRules
<Common request parameters>

{
    "NamespaceName": "kofj",
    "RegistryId": "tcr-mfoeec7x",
    "Rule": {
        "RepositoryDecoration": "repoMatches",
        "RepositoryPattern": "**",
        "TagPattern": "**",
        "TagDecoration": "matches"
    }
}
CreateImmutableTagRules.title: Creating a rule

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tcr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json

}

CreateSecurityPolicy.title: Creating a public network access allowlist policy for an instance

CreateServiceAccount.document: This example shows you how to create a service account with the specified `Duration`.
CreateServiceAccount.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tcr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateServiceAccount
<Common request parameters>

{
    "RegistryId": "tcr-45uu7ras",
    "Name": "test",
    "Description": "for test",
    "Duration": 10,
    "Permissions": [
        {
            "Resource": "test",
            "Actions": [
                "tcr:PullRepository",
                "tcr:PushRepository",
                "tcr:CreateRepository"
            ]
        }
    ]
}
CreateServiceAccount.title: Creating a service account with specified `Duration`

CreateServiceAccount.document: This example shows you how to create a service account.
CreateServiceAccount.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tcr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateServiceAccount
<Common request parameters>

{
    "RegistryId": "abc",
    "Name": "abc",
    "Description": "abc",
    "Duration": 0,
    "ExpiresAt": 0,
    "Disable": true,
    "Permissions": [
        {
            "Resource": "abc",
            "Actions": [
                "abc"
            ]
        }
    ]
}
CreateServiceAccount.title: Creating a service account

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tcr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateSignature

    "NamespaceName": "library",
    "RepositoryName": "nginx",
    "RegistryId": "tcr-okmju7",
    "ImageVersion": "v1.2.0"
}
CreateSignature.title: Creating an image signature

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tcr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateSignaturePolicy
<Common request parameters>

{
    "RegistryId": "tcr-f7g1ir99",
    "Name": "library signing",
    "NamespaceName": "library",
    "KmsId": "08408a30-0416-11ed-abdc-52540036b432",
    "KmsRegion": "",
    "Disabled": false
}

X-TC-Action: DescribeCustomAccounts

    "RegistryId": "tcr-xxx",
    "EmbedPermission": true,
    "All": false,
    "Filters": [],
    "Offset": 0,
    "Limit": 20
}
